ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: So We opened the gates of heaven with torrential water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And We opened up the flood gates of the sky with water pouring down in torrents,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thereupon We opened the gates of the sky for water to pour down,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We opened the gates of the sky and water started to pour down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: We therefore opened the gates of heaven, with water flowing furiously.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: So, We opened the gates of the heaven with water Munhamir.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So We opened the gates of the cloud with water pouring
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Then We opened the gates of heaven unto water torrential,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Then opened We the gates of heaven with pouring water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: So We opened the gates of the sky with water pouring down in torrents,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then We opened the portals of heaven with water poured out.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Then We opened the gates of the sky with pouring waters,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: So We opened the gates of heaven, with water pouring forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: So We opened the gates of heaven with water pouring forth.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: We opened the Gates of Heaven with torrential water
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: So We opened the floodgates of heaven with water pouring down.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Then We opened the gates of the heaven with rain pouring down
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [54:11] Then We opened (read fa-fatahnā or fa-fattahnā) the gates of the heaven with torrential waters, [waters] pouring down intensely,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Then opened We the gates of heaven) for 40 days (with pouring water) with pouring rain.
